metadata.Title: CVE-2018-17580 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A heap-based buffer over-read exists in the function fast_edit_packet() in the file send_packets.c of Tcpreplay v4.3.0 beta1. This can lead to Denial of Service (DoS) and potentially Information Exposure when the application attempts to process a crafted pcap file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-17580` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

tcpreplay - 4.3.2-1build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tcpreplay package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.3.2-1build1').
